SEARCH:
程序包 ltseed.chatinmc.Talker

类 Chatter

java.lang.Object
ltseed.chatinmc.Talker.Chatter
public class Chatter extends Object
This class represents a Chatter who is capable of communicating with players in Minecraft. It contains methods for saving, loading, and deleting the chatter's configuration data. It also contains a method for generating a description of the chatter's properties.
版本:
1.0
作者:
ltseed

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Chatter

      public Chatter()
      Constructs a new Chatter object.

    • Chatter

      public Chatter(File chatter) throws IOException, org.bukkit.configuration.InvalidConfigurationException, InvalidChatterException
      Constructs a new Chatter object by loading the chatter's configuration data from a file.
      参数:
      chatter - the file containing the chatter's configuration data
      抛出:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while reading the file
      org.bukkit.configuration.InvalidConfigurationException - if the file contains invalid configuration data
      InvalidChatterException - if the file contains invalid chatter data

  • 方法详细资料

    • getCore

      public static MessageBuilder getCore(Long dialogTime1, String model, String projectId) throws InvalidChatterException
      获取消息构建器实例，根据传入的模型类型和项目ID进行创建。
      参数:
      dialogTime1 - 消息对话开始时间
      model - 模型类型，支持 "ChatGPT" 和 "DialogFlow" 两种类型，以及以 "ChatGPT_" 开头的自定义模型类型
      projectId - 项目ID，仅在使用 "DialogFlow" 模型时需要传入
      返回:
      返回对应的消息构建器实例
      抛出:
      InvalidChatterException - 当模型类型不合法时抛出异常

    • getEntity

      @Nullable public org.bukkit.entity.Entity getEntity()
      Returns the entity associated with the chatter.
      返回:
      the entity associated with the chatter

    • describe

      public Map<String,Object> describe()
      Returns a map of the chatter's properties.
      返回:
      a map of the chatter's properties

    • saveToFile

      public void saveToFile(File Folder) throws IOException
      Saves the chatter's configuration data to a file.
      参数:
      Folder - the folder in which to save the file
      抛出:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while saving the file

    • delete

      public void delete()
      删除当前实例所对应的 chatter 文件。
